ygData.subject: Re: Addendum..
ygData.msgSnippet: Freeport is totally KOS to Trolls and Ogres, and Dark Elves are KOS is North Freeport.┬á Nobody will sell to you there until you ve practically decimated half
ygData.messageBody:
Freeport is totally KOS to Trolls and Ogres, and Dark Elves are KOS is North
Freeport.∩┐╜ Nobody will sell to you there until you've practically decimated
half the orc population in the Commonlands.∩┐╜ I still can't buy or sell in
Freeport and I've collectively destroyed dozens of orc camps.
∩┐╜
∩┐╜∩┐╜∩┐╜ Do all your buying and selling in Neriak or Grobb.∩┐╜ Avoid Inns at ALL
costs, avoid most Guards too.∩┐╜ This is easily accomplished by staying on the
periphery of the zones and never going in the center for the most part.
∩┐╜
∩┐╜∩┐╜∩┐╜ Change your faction?∩┐╜ Kill orcs... many many orcs.∩┐╜ Kill high level
orcs.∩┐╜ As a matter of habit I kill any orc I see simply to improve faction.∩┐╜
But if you are less than level 8 you probably should still be in Innothule
and Neriak anyway.∩┐╜ Nektulos Forest has a decent higher newbie area south of
their one bridge.∩┐╜ Chocked full of shadow wolves, large spiders, skeletons,
and black bears, as well as the occasional young kodiak and two halfling
"camps".∩┐╜ Steer clear of those.
∩┐╜
Malark, Karana

-----Original Message-----
From: W.G. Rowland [mailto:wgr@...]
Sent: Friday, April 30, 1999 11:55 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Addendum..


∩┐╜∩┐╜∩┐╜ Oh.. Nearly forgot..∩┐╜ In the middle regions..∩┐╜ Who will KoS us.. Who
will barter with us.. And what can we kill to improve our faction to change
the situation.. (Mainly concerned with Freeport and the merchants in East
Commons)
